metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Baldur's MouthAfter Foundry destroyed, civilians come to deactivated SW.One of civilians dialogs
metadata.how_to_trigger: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=89.665054;49.625427;-40.672653&camTarget=89.123558;49.013592;-41.249229ReCon `SetGlobalOsirisFlag GLO_Foundry_State_ControlCentreDestroyed`Wait for npc to appear and talk to this particular npc.

0.speaker: 'Gunny' Sacko
0.text: I don't like this. If something's capable of destroying even a Steel Watcher, what hope do the Fists have of protecting us?

2.speaker: 'Gunny' Sacko
2.text: The Flaming Fist are playing it cool, but look at them - they're scared.

3.speaker: 'Gunny' Sacko
3.text: The way I see it, if you've got nothing to hide, you've got nothing to fear from being watched.

1.speaker: 'Gunny' Sacko
1.text: It's not like the Steel Watchers are even sentient. Far as I can tell, they're more loyal than some of the Fists.

4.speaker: 'Gunny' Sacko
4.text: The Watchers just want to keep us safe, why don't people get that?
